message: Let's start with a fair, but slightly tilted deal. I hope you find it acceptable.
You were too generous, now it's my turn to be a bit more aggressive
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to be taken advantage of. Let's find a middle ground.
I'm not going to give you the upper hand, let's see if you'll take a slightly better offer from me
I'm not going to accept your last offer. Let's try a fair split,  I'm willing to give you a bit more than in my last offer.
I'm starting to get a bit impatient, will you finally accept a 50/50 split?
